name: Night Fury
description: Night $FURY is a Solana-based memecoin inspired by the power and mystique of dragons. Representing speed, fire, and scarcity, $FURY uses the dragon theme to symbolize strength and rapid growth in the crypto space. With a focus on community engagement, rewards, and massive burns that reduce supply, $FURY aims to ignite excitement across Solana while establishing itself as a fun, fiery, and unstoppable force of nature in the memecoin ecosystem.
